GLOBAL_ATTRIBUTES_VALUES: RSP L2 data in format of PACE HARP-2 Level-1C AUX Data
NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies
Bastiaan van Diedenhoven (formerly GISS, now SRON); Brian Cairns (GISS); Andrzej Wasilewski (GISS)
RSP is an instrument that can be mounted on several high and low-flying aircraft.
RSP measures along the aricraft track only and has no swath. Hence swath width in these files is equal to 1
Flights are divided into individual legs for which the aircraft is flying in a relatively straight path
these Aux files go along RSP PACE-like L1C files
